repo_list.description: My solution of ACM problems
This is a sample app that is part of a blog post I have written about how to architect android application using the Uncle Bob's clean architecture approach.
Project Guidelines for the Android Buffer App
An Android template with navigation drawer for material design
This library allows to use Material steppers inside Android applications.
Android library to observe scroll events on scrollable views.
Demonstrations of new android architecture components.
Provide clean way to access, create, update database in android.
This is customize code to show only month and year field in the android DatePicker.
Android example with volley and disk caching
A custom view for Android. It consists of a larger center circular view that is surrounded by other circles which may represent data.
Example app to demonstrate compound views.

Sample project created to show some of the best Android practices to work in the Android UI Layer. The UI layer of this project has been implemented using MVP or MVVM (without binding engine) to show how this patterns works. This project is used during the talk "EffectiveAndroidUI".
Ekushe Boi Mela App for Eatl
How to create Java Thread and Use it in android application.
This is customize code to get listview total heights.
A Layoutmanager that must be used with RecyclerView. When list is scrolled views are moved by circular trajectory
An Android APP
A library that helps developers creating their Android Application with Material Design.
An application about movies with material design
Implementation of Material Design Chips component for Android
Product sales app.
Open-Source Android Apps
Smart LCC
Android refactoring.
Android weather app to get city weather information.

Call blocker and child safety app. User can create a whitelist for incoming calls instead of blacklisting strangers. Parents and children can use it to communicate in busy periods and danger sitautions.
TagView to add tag and remove tag.
Task Manager App
💯 Algorithms study materials, behavioral content and tips for rocking your coding interview
Decorate your TextView easily
Live Audio Equalizer with wave effect
